A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Worst Star Wars movie I have ever seen\, a complete let down\, and I have been a fan since day one.  I left with fifteen minutes left\, and refuse for the first time in my life to watch the rest of that garbage or anything else they make until Johnson and Kennedy are gone. I was literally so annoyed and angry by the time that I made it to that point in the movie that I looked at my friends as we were all fuming and asked \"are we actually going to do it?\"\, and they all said \"let's go\"\, and we did along with many others that left the theater before us and some joined us on the way out the door. How in the world did they actually consider that a Star Wars movie? The slowest space chase in history with a goofy space casino\, no Jedi training\, the Emperor 2.0 is killed in one second by safe space emo boy\, and Mary Poppins leaves Disney to Join Lucasfilm? No\, I'm done...
